data.message: Above all I wish you a very good 2013 and my best wishes, well what takes place it is that yesterday harms bandits came blocked(surrounded) our group on Facebook they are at present the only administrators(directors), they are that two members of the group, in addition to that they expelled all the members who belonged to the administrators(directors), there we want got back our and we do not know solution, the group is called " For close(plain) and inseparable Mauritania " please watch to help us
